message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to make a smart investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $7500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $8500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $8000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
